caption: This photograph depicts a tranquil maritime scene featuring a small fishing boat on a calm blue sea. The boat is primarily white with a red trim running along its lower edges and has a green cabin. On the boat, three individuals, possibly fishermen, are engaged in activity, likely preparing or handling fishing equipment. The ocean extends broadly around the boat, meeting a pale blue sky at the horizon. The water appears calm with minimal wave activity, suggesting a serene day perfect for fishing. The overall composition of the photo focuses on the isolation and peacefulness of the boat in the vast expanse of the ocean.
title: Commercial lobstermen in the New York Bight, a unique coastal marine environment because of the extent of man's activities. The bight includes 15,000 square miles of ocean waters and continental shelf off the coasts of New York and New Jersey. There are indications man's activities have disturbed the ecological balance in the marine environment. Near New York City.
